s.text: Therefore, With due Respect and Humanity after my prayer asking God to direct me to a God fearing person or a church that will channel this Fund to the work of God so, I write to donate/ hand over this fund ($2.600.000.
Thanks and waiting to read from you soonest.
Thanks and waiting to read from you soonest.
Thanks and waiting to read from you soonest.
Thanks and waiting to read from you soonest.
For a legal documentation process in your name to transfer the fund to you without any hindrance to accomplish our vow to God.
For a legal documentation process in your name to transfer the fund to you without any hindrance to accomplish our vow to God.
Your names Telephone and fax number Resident address

I, Mrs. Catherine William, 68 years old without a child, married to late Dr. William Johnson from Israel who worked with Oil Company (PETROCI) Cote d'Ivoire before he died in the year 2008 after a Cardiac Arteries Operation.
